altername_name: Kids DS: Dekita yo! Mama: Otokonoko
name: Smart Boy's Gameroom
overview: Inspired by classic pre-school books and games, the boy version of I did It Mum! feature games such as ‘toy train’ and ‘drive the car.' I Did It Mum! even offers a voice recording opportunity for Mum (or Dad) to congratulate and encourage their child when completing the mini games.
